member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.AppId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Facebook-assigned appId

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.AppSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the Facebook-assigned app secret

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.AuthorizationEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI where the client will be redirected to authenticate. The default value is 'https://www.facebook.com/dialog/oauth'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.TokenEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI the middleware will access to exchange the OAuth token. The default value is 'https://graph.facebook.com/oauth/access_token'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.UserInformationEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI the middleware will access to obtain the user information. The default value is 'https://graph.facebook.com/me'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelCertificateValidator
member.summary: Gets or sets the a pinned certificate validator to use to validate the endpoints used in back channel communications belong to Facebook.
member.remarks: If this property is null then the default certificate checks are performed, validating the subject name and if the signing chain is a trusted party.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets timeout value in milliseconds for back channel communications with Facebook.
member.value: The back channel timeout in milliseconds.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelHttpHandler
member.summary: The HttpMessageHandler used to communicate with Facebook. This cannot be set at the same time as BackchannelCertificateValidator unless the value can be downcast to a WebRequestHandler.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.Caption
member.summary: Get or sets the text that the user can display on a sign in user interface.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.CallbackPath
member.summary: The request path within the application's base path where the user-agent will be returned. The middleware will process this request when it arrives. Default value is "/signin-facebook".

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.SignInAsAuthenticationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of another authentication middleware which will be responsible for actually issuing a user .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.Provider
member.summary: Gets or sets the used to handle authentication events.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.StateDataFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the type used to secure data handled by the middleware.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.Scope
member.summary: A list of permissions to request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Facebook.FacebookAuthenticationOptions.SendAppSecretProof
member.summary: Gets or sets if the appsecret_proof should be generated and sent with Facebook API calls. This is enabled by default.
